src_original: yena yena rupeṇa vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ,  tena tena rupeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  tathāgatavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatarupeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
arhattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāmarhattvarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  bodhisattvavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
nārāyaṇavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ nārāyaṇarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /  brahmavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ brahmarūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
